Description:
ResponsibilitiesSupervise and motivate call center team members to provide outstanding customer services.
Lead the team to achieve predetermined sales targets, KPIs and goals.
Develop call center procedures, scripts, and manuals to improve the efficiency and productivity of the team.
Evaluate call center team performance regularly and provide constructive feedback to improve performance.
Ensure call center staffing needs are met by coordinating work schedules, leave requests and, training programs.
Ensure all customer complaints are handled timely and professionally and escalated to appropriate departments when necessary.
Maintain updated records, logs, and reports of call center operations and customer interactions.RequirementsBachelor's degree in Business Administration, Communication, or any other related field.
Proven work experience as a call center team leader or manager with exceptional leadership skills.
In-depth knowledge of call center procedures and technology.
Ability to lead and motivate a team effectively.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Strong computer skills, including proficiency in Microsoft Office applications.Job Details
